query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZMMT147 ( MANDT , SEQNO , POSID , POST1 , MATNR , MATNR_NM , SPEC , SHIPDAT , RTNDAT , ZQNTY , RTNTXT , MENGE , ZCOST1 , ZCOST2 , RTN_RSL , STATUS , BIGO , CRNAM , CRDAT , CRTIM ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT# , NEXTVAL FOR SAPHEE.SQ_ZMMT147_SEQ , #POSID# , #POST1# , #MATNR# , #MATNR_NM# , #SPEC# , #SHIPDAT# , #RTNDAT# , #ZQNTY# , #RTNTXT# , #MENGE# , #ZCOST1# , #ZCOST2# , #RTN_RSL# , #STATUS# , #BIGO# , #G_USER_ID# , HEX(CURRENT DATE) , HEX(CURRENT TIME) )
